Package stocks.view

Interface GuiView

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractScreen, BuyByWeightsScreen, BuySellStocksPage, CreatePortfolioScreen, CreatePortfolioWithSipScreen, EditPortfolioPage, ErrorScreen, GraphScreen, HomeScreen, InfoScreen, LoginScreen, ShowTableScreen, ViewCompositionPage, ViewCostBasisPage, ViewPerformancePage, ViewValuationPage
    public interface GuiView
    Interface of the Graphical User Interface for the Portfolio Management View. Adds action listeners to the GUI elements and sets the visibility of the screen to switch control between multiple screens.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addFeatures​(Features features)
      Adds action listeners to events performed by the user on the GUI elements.
      void setVisibility​(boolean visibility)
      Toggles the visibility of the screen.

    • Method Detail

      • addFeatures

        void addFeatures​(Features features)
        Adds action listeners to events performed by the user on the GUI elements.
        Parameters:
        features - Features that are added to the GUI elements as action listeners.

      • setVisibility

        void setVisibility​(boolean visibility)
        Toggles the visibility of the screen.
        Parameters:
        visibility - True, to display the screen or False, to hide the screen.
